scripts.test: echo "To test, simply run npm start (or npm run startall if you haven't installed needed dependencies)" && exit 0
scripts.start: npm install && cd client && npm install --save --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../ && concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && node server.js"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install --save --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../
scripts.startall: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && node server.js"
